results.title: USA Rare Earth lines up $1.6 billion in US government funds
results.snippet: USA Rare Earth Inc. signed a non-binding agreement with the Commerce Department for $1.6 billion in funding, the latest White House deal to boost production of rare-earth elements on domestic soil.

results.title: Trump Administration Takes Another Stake in Rare Earth Sector
results.snippet: The administration announced a $1.6 billion deal with USA Rare Earth. The firm also does business with Cantor Fitzgerald, which is run by the sons of President Trump's commerce secretary.

results.title: America Needs Rare Earth Magnets, and USA Rare Earth Is Positioning Itself to Fill the Gap
results.snippet: As trade tensions rise, the U.S. is racing to secure domestic supplies of critical minerals. USA Rare Earth is one of the companies leading the charge.

results.title: USA Rare Earth races to plug America's rare earth magnet shortage
results.snippet: America's clean energy and defense ambitions now hinge on a tiny class of components: rare earth magnets that power everything from F-35 actuators to Tesla drive motors. USA Rare Earth is positioning itself as the company that can close that gap,
